pages.text: $(li)Plantain Spiders are a variant of the $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/spider)Spiders$(/l).$(br)$(li)They can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/jungle/jungle)Jungles$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/jungle/bamboo_jungle)Bamboo Jungles$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/grass/rainforest)Rain Forests$(/l) of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)They can appears when you break a $(l)Banana Bundle$() too.
